projects.name: Minoo
projects.description: I worked on a project called Minoo which is a molecular test device used to identify the genetic signature of viruses and display it is result in a few minutes via a Mobile Application.
projects.achievements:
• Contributed to the migration from MVVM to Bloc Pattern.
  • Fixing a high priority bugs related to the connection between the mobile app and the device using NFC and Bluetooth.
  • Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers to redesign the whole app and create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces while ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
  • Integrated RESTful APIs and implemented data persistence using Dio and Floor libraries.
  • Write and executed unit, widget and golden tests.
  • Used our pipelines(GitLab CI/CD) to perform code quality check (flutter lints), execute tests, build and deploy on Firebase App Distribution
  • Conducted code reviews, identified areas for improvement, and provided constructive feedback to team members.

projects.name: MyBiat
projects.description:
I Worked on a mobile banking application called MyBiat, it's set to provide users with
convenient access to their financial accounts and perform various banking transactions securely and efficiently.
projects.achievements:
• Developed and maintained a native android application using a banking solution called Backbase, ensuring high performance, security, and code quality.
  • Collaborated with backend developers to define and implement APIs for seamlessdata exchange.
  • Collaborated with UX/UI designer and product owner to create user interfaces and to implement custom UI components and animations to enhance the user experience.
  • Working closely with the QA team to resolve issues and to maintain the app stability.
  • Wrote and executed Unit and UI test.
  • Used our pipeline(jenkins) to perform code quality check(sonar cube), execute the Unit and UI tests, build the application(Fastlane), deploy on appCenter.
  • Worked in an Agile development environment, participating in daily stand-ups,refinement, sprint planning, sprint review, retrospective and code reviews.

projects.name: My Biat Corporate
projects.description: I Worked on a Mobile banking application for corporates, allowing to confirm the transactions of approval/rejection of batches made from the Web application.
projects.achievements:
• Developed and maintained a native android application using a banking solution called Backbase, ensuring high performance, security, and code quality.
  • Collaborated with backend developers to define and implement APIs for seamlessdata exchange.
  • Collaborated with UX/UI designer and product owner to create user interfaces and to implement custom UI components and animations to enhance the user experience.
  • Working closely with the QA team to resolve issues and to maintain the app stability.
  • Wrote and executed Unit and UI test.
  • Used our pipeline(jenkins) to perform code quality check(sonar cube), execute the Unit and UI tests, build the application(Fastlane), deploy on appCenter.
  • Worked in an Agile development environment, participating in daily stand-ups,refinement, sprint planning, sprint review, retrospective and code reviews.

projects.name: Momi
projects.description: I worked on a Project called Momi which is a platform for linking service providers and owners of real estate assets. The mobile app allows owners to make/manage services or construction work requests.
projects.achievements:
• Contributed to the development of Flutter applications, delivering features and enhancements within tight deadlines.
  • Collaborated with backend developers to define and implement APIs(ex: implement oauth 2 authentication using an authentication server called keycloak).
  • Collaborated with UX/UI designer and product owner to create user interfaces.
  • Worked Closely with the QA team to resolve issues.
  • preparing and presenting demo to our customer at the end of every sprint.
  • Actively participated in Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and retrospective meetings.

projects.name: SoWine
projects.description: I worked on a project called SoWine which is a wine market place designed to connect and facilitate interactions between various actors in the wine industry, including both individual consumers and professionals.
projects.achievements:
• Collaborated with a cross-functional team to design and develop the SoWine Android application, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
  • Leveraged the Android SDK, Kotlin and several the new android architecture components to implement robust features, functionalities, and UI components in line with the project requirements
  • Collaborated closely with backend developers and API engineers to ensure smooth data synchronization and real-time updates between the Android application and the server using Sockets.
  • Use Camerax Library to create a fully customised camera interface that takes snapshot of the wine bottle and send it to backend to recognise the wine brand.
  • Collaborated with UX/UI designer to develop interactive and visually appealing user interfaces, optimized for various screen sizes and resolutions.

projects.name: Momkin
projects.description:
I worked on project called Momkin to provide job seekers with tools to
acquire the required skills and professional attitudes.
projects.achievements:
• Collaborated with a cross-functional team to design and develop the Android application, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
  • Work Closely with the backend developers to make the app fully customisable via an admin web portal.
  • Implemented custom UI components and animations to enhance the user experience.
  • Actively participated in Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and retrospective meetings.
